name: the backrooms vr (itch)
description:
Hi, I'm tar_bloodz_vr and I made this game it's still in development and it's my first post on itch.io for now it's a hangout game of the backrooms using gorilla tag locomotion system hope you enjoy, multiplayer should work.

(UPDATE) added new floor texture, information board, loading screen should work, added room entrances that will be used for later builds. Enjoy.
